ygData.subject: Re: Predacons Under attack
ygData.msgSnippet: Maxima was trying to rally the Preds when she was being shot at. Ducking she twisted about just to welcome a bolt that hits her in the center of her belly.

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima was trying to rally the Preds when she was being shot at. 

Ducking she twisted about just to welcome a bolt that hits her in the center 
of her belly. 

"Arrggh!" she stumbled & fell back. 

After being stunned a moment, she shook it off, & attempted to get back up. 
But she felt the pain as indeed, she was wounded. But... didn't matter to her. 
She still had to fight. 

"FIRE! DAMN IT! Fire! Let none of them stand," she hissed with the twinge of 
her pain, as she fell back her her knees & winced, holding her wound. Reaching 
out again to her rifle, she lifted it up & fired back at Darkangel. 

--part1_9c.331e78dc.2c38b9b4_boundary
